section.div:
<definitions xmlns="http://ws.apache.org/ns/synapse">
<sequence name="main"> <callout serviceURL="http://localhost:9000/services/SimpleStockQuoteService" action="urn:getQuote"> <source xmlns:s11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:s12="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xpath="s11:Body/child::*[fn:position()=1] | s12:Body/child::*[fn:position()=1]"/> <target xmlns:s11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:s12="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xpath="s11:Body/child::*[fn:position()=1] | s12:Body/child::*[fn:position()=1]"/> </callout> <property name="RESPONSE" value="true"/> <header name="To" action="remove"/> <send/> <drop/> </sequence>
</definitions>

ul.li: Deploy the SimpleStockQuoteService in the sample Axis2 server and start Axis2

Start Synapse using the configuration numbered 430 (repository/conf/sample/synapse_sample_430.xml)
Unix/Linux: sh synapse.sh -sample 430
Windows: synapse.bat -sample 430
